Text: I download it, but I can not figure out how to burn it. Also, when try to play it on my computer, it allows me to click which workout I want to do but when the video begins to play it quits after the beachbody ad.

You might need to update your codec on your media player to get it to play properly. However, if you want to burn it...I suggest using DVDFab. It can be found here if you do a search. It burns .iso files and others pretty well.
